scripts.build: npm run clean && babel app/js -d build/js && jade app/templates -H -o build && node-sass app/scss -o build/css && npm run images
scripts.build:scss: node-sass app/scss -o build/css & node-sass -wr app/scss -o build/css
scripts.start: npm run clean && npm run images & npm run build:js & npm run build:jade & npm run build:scss & npm run live
